application.name: gxine
application.summary: GTK frontend for the xine multimedia library

description.p: gxine is a fully-featured free audio/video player for unix-like systems which uses libxine for audio/video decoding and playback. For more informations on what formats are supported, please refer to the libxine documentation. gxine is a gtk based gui for this xine-library alternate to xine-ui.
